title: FBS_MODESEL (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_MODESEL :
Definition of SF_ModeSelector function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: MODE_SELECTED
rows.Comment: Valid mode selection, but NOT yet locked.

rows.Name: MODE_CHANGED
rows.Comment:
State after activation or when S_ModeX has changed (unless
locked) or after Reset of an error state.

rows.Name: ERR_SHORTCIRCUIT
rows.Comment:
The FB detected that two or more S_ModeX are TRUE, e.g.,
short-circuit of cables.

rows.Name: ERR_SHORTCIRCUIT_RESREQ
rows.Comment:
No more short short-circuit of cables (Only one S_ModeX OR
no S_ModeX), the error can be reset

rows.Name: ERR_OPENCIRCUIT
rows.Comment:
The FB detected that all S_ModeX are FALSE: The period
following a falling S_ModeX trigger exceeds ModeMonitorTime,
e.g. open-circuit of cables.

rows.Name: ERR_OPENCIRCUIT_RESREQ
rows.Comment: No more One S_ModeX is TRUE, the error can be reset

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal detected in state C410.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Static Reset signal detected in state C420.
